modName: Requiem - Behind The Curtain Consistency Patch
summary: The patch aims to bring the excellent mod Requiem - Behind The Curtain in line with changes from Weapons and Armor fixes and Clothing and Clutter fixes plus a few more changes.
descriptionHtml:
Hello everyone, this is a patch to make Requiem - Behind the Curtain by [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/860976]zer0morph[/url] compatible with changes from:
1. [url=http://http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/61520/?]KFR - Kryptopyr's Fixes Reqtified[/url].
2.[url=http://http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/70656/?]WM Flora Fixes[/url] (Optional).

Other changes:
1. Changed description of Atronach stone to be the same as other standing stones (included by zer0morph in v1.8.2 of the original mod).
2. Carried over changes from Requiem - Hearthfires for mudcrab legs.
3. Changed nightvision imagespace values and removed radial blur. This makes it compatible with Requiem - Realistic Darkness but not dependant on it.
4. Brings NPCs changed by BtC in line with Requiem stats and perks while maintaining the BtC changes.
5. Added two new lore friendly books to explain each of the Divine's tenets, likes, dislikes and bonuses. No numbers revealed. Books have been distributed to court wizards, college of winterhold library, general store merchants.

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/61621/?]Requiem - Patch Central[/url] : First place to look if in need of patches for popular mods.

Credits:
The Requiem Dungeon Masters - for creating the wonderful piece of art called Requiem.
FadingSignal - TES5Edit Tutorials
zer0morph - For creating Behind the Curtain which is most certainly a wonderful addition to Requiem.

Permissions:
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/860976]zer0morph[/url] is free to make changes to this and merge it into the original mod if he/she sees fit.
author: theparanoidguy

files.name: Requiem - BtC KFR COR Patch
files.changelogHtml:
Patched a few items that weren't patched before.
Removed some unnecessary imported records.
BONUS: Added two new lore friendly books describing the tenets of the divines. Distributed these books to court wizards, Arcaneum, Genral goods merchants.
